Package com.mongodb

Class LazyDBEncoder

java.lang.Object
com.mongodb.LazyDBEncoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
DBEncoder
public class LazyDBEncoder extends Object implements DBEncoder
Encoder that only knows how to encode BSONObject instances of type LazyDBObject.
